mapper.select: SELECT match_id, league, match_mm, FROM_UNIXTIME(match_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS m_time, home_name, away_name FROM sway_match WHERE FROM_UNIXTIME(match_time) > NOW() ORDER BY match_time ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT match_id, league, match_mm, FROM_UNIXTIME(match_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS m_time, description, home_name, away_name, status, score FROM sway_match WHERE league = #{league} AND match_mm = #{month} ORDER BY match_time DESC

SELECT match_id, league, match_mm, FROM_UNIXTIME(match_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS m_time, description, home_name, away_name, status, score FROM sway_match WHERE league = #{league} AND match_mm = #{month} AND status = 0 ORDER BY match_time ASC

SELECT match_id, league, match_mm, FROM_UNIXTIME(match_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS m_time, description, home_name, away_name, status, score, result FROM sway_match WHERE league = #{league} AND match_mm = #{month} AND status = 1 ORDER BY match_time DESC
